name: Lost Past
description:
CONTROLS - A and D for movement, F for interactions, mouse for picking dialogue options

---------------------------------------

You play as a nameless man who lost his memory. 

In this story based game, you will be able to uncover mystery in his past and will see what one can do if he is blinded by love while walking throught hand-painted 2D world.

The story is narrated by conversations and by memories of main character.

Also, the is my first time doing game like this.. So any suggestions and critique is most welcome... :)

---------------------------------------

Tools used 

  • Game engine : UNITY
  • Scripting IDE : Visual Studio 2017
  • Graphics : Gimp, Autodesk SketchBook
  • Music : LMMS with midi controller iRig 37 PRO
